body: Damn, they don’t meet for eight years. They’re lucky either one didn’t move on. Imagine eight years, that’s back to 2013 from time of comment 2021. I hate these types of time skips in romance and hentai where both people don’t even speak for years. Feels unrealistic and like a copout. Like it makes sense if one character is in a coma or something like that.
They should had destroy that rapist dick
